  • Constructor Details

    • Product

      public Product(int productId, double _price, int _currentStock, int _amountOnOrder)
      This constructor creates a model of a user and inserts it into the db
      Parameters:
      productId - -unique identifier for the product
      _price - - Price charged for this product
      _currentStock - - Current stock in house of this product
      _amountOnOrder - - Amount more of this product on order to stock

  • Method Details

    • getPrice

      public double getPrice()
      this using a concrete product returns its price
      Returns:
      cost - Price of defined Product

    • getCurrentStock

      public static int getCurrentStock(int id)
      This method makes use of how its static by allowing a user to search for any particular product with having to create a product class explicitly
      Parameters:
      id - - Given concrete id to find stock via select statment
      Returns:
      stock - gives the stock stored in the sqlite db

    • getAmountOnOrder

      public abstract int getAmountOnOrder()
      This method checks the sqlite database to retrieve the current amount on order
      Returns:
      amountOnOrder - retrieves the amountOnOrder through sqlite

    • setPrice

      public void setPrice(double _price)
      This method, given a concrete product, sets a new price
      Parameters:
      _price - - takes in a new price to replace the original price of the object

    • setAmountOnOrder

      public void setAmountOnOrder(int _amountOnOrder)
      This method given a concrete product, adjusts the current amount on order
      Parameters:
      _amountOnOrder - - takes in a new amount on order and replaces the original amount

    • stockDecremented

      public static void stockDecremented(int id)
      Given a concrete id, the method decrements the current stock by 1 for when a user purchases a prodcut in the sqlite db
      Parameters:
      id - - Given product id to decrement
